problem.markdown:
1. For a dark input image (most pixels have low gray values), which of the following transformations on gray values(r) produces a better image
(x) log(r) ( ) r + a; a > 0 ( ) ar+b; a and b are > 0 ( ) None of the above
2. The linear transformation function f(r) =4r+160 produces which of the following changes in input image, where r denotes gray values of input image?
( ) Increased contrast ( ) Decreased brightness (x) Increased brightness ( ) No change
3. In windowing, gray values falling beyond the upper range of the window are
(x) Reduced to zero ( ) Raised to 255 ( ) Not changed ( ) Reduced by half
4. Which of the following will produce the negative image of given input image
( ) Add each pixel from the maximum pixel value (x) Subtract each pixel from the maximum pixel value ( ) Divide each pixel from the maximum pixel value ( ) Multiply each pixel from the maximum pixel value
